entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 10:56 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:31 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Freezing rain over southern sections. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 07:31 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 07:31 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
